classes.cCustomNote: Any free elective can go here. Recommended: Foreign Language 101.
Any free elective can go here. Recommended: Foreign Language 102.
Any Foreign Language 103-Level can go here. Refer to catalog for course options. Can be taken anytime during Freshman Year.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1 or D2 (depending on whether HIST202 or HIST223 is selected in support), D2, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B and Upper-Division C should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Upper-Division C cannot be fulfilled with COMS courses. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
